name: Pipe Runner 2
description:
>> 

Pipe Runner 2

Welcome. First we choose one of the 4 characters in the main menu. And in the game we have 3 places in the game. We are changing our place to escape from the winds. But there is another obstacle in the spring if you touch it to the lower level or lower level. . Please note that there may be some errors in the game development phase.

Instructions 

switch between pipes with arrow keys or [W] & [S]
>avoid spikes
>collect coins
>metal springs automatically change your position, so be careful
>shield protects you for 7 seconds

>> Controls 

WS or Up down arrow key 

>> Credits 

A game fully remaked by Lightnex Games

Coding By cgBB 

Play original game > https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/213968402/
